Professional Development
Register Now! Courses Through March are Instructor-Led Online ►
Next Start Dates ►









Professional development programs are short-term programs designed to help you learn a new skill and advance or change your career more quickly than a traditional degree program. 









 Certificate Programs 
 Programs for Educators 
 Locations/Online 

 Corporate Training 









Certificate Programs
Certificate programs are generally completed in 3-24 months and include a certificate at the completion of the program. This certificate helps you demonstrate your knowledge and experience in the subject. You can learn more about what a certificate is on our What is a Certificate? page. 
Certificate programs are offered in multiple fields. Click on the link below to view the available programs in each field.





Business



Crime & Forensics



Legal & Fiduciary Management






Technology & Engineering


View all Certificate Programs








Programs for Educators
Through immersive and personalized instruction, our educator programs are designed to help educators fulfill their professional needs, from completing their credentials to meeting prerequisites. Each program offers multiple opportunities for hands-on learning and application of the skills you learn.
View all Educator Programs








Locations/Online
Our professional development programs are currently offered online. Click on the link below to view the available programs.





Fullerton



Online









Corporate Training
We offer programs that can be customized and tailored to the needs of your organization and employees. Click on the link below to learn more about corporate training. 
Learn more about corporate training








What's Your Next Step?

					                     Learn how to successfully take courses online or join our email list. By joining our email list, we will send you important program updates.
				





Get Started


						                         Learn what steps to take next to start your certificate program.
					

Getting Started →






				                     &amp;lt;a href="https://uee.formstack.com/forms/csufeip_stayconnected" title="Online Form"&amp;gt;Online Form - Prof Dev Master Email Sign-up - Clean up COPY&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
				




Non-California Residents

					                     Due to state and federal regulations, non-California residents may only enroll in CSUF online courses when their state has authorized CSUF as a provider. You can learn more about online program eligibility on the  State Regulations page.
				














  Email Us: eipconnect@fullerton.edu

The safety of our students, faculty and staff is our highest priority. Given the guidance from the CDC and Governor Newsom, all Fall 2020 courses will be held virtually. You may follow our updates by selecting the banner at the top of our website. Thank you for your patience.
